text: Qadi Aftarayna `Ala Allahi Kadhibaan 'In `Udna Fi Millatikum Ba`da 'Idh Najjana Allahu Minha Wa Ma Yakunu Lana 'An Na`uda Fiha 'Illa 'An Yasha'a Allahu Rabbuna Wasi`a Rabbuna Kulla Shay'in `Ilmaan `Ala Allahi Tawakkalna Rabbana Aftah Baynana Wa Bayna Qawmina Bil-Haqqi Wa 'Anta Khayru Al-Fatihina
